product.modal.tip1: Measure your ring size at the end of the day when fingers are at their largest.
product.modal.tip2: Consider the width of the band, a particularly thick band will feel tighter than a thin band so you may want to buy a full size larger that your normal ring size.
product.modal.tip3: Do not measure your hands when they are cold, they may have shrunk up to half a size.
product.modal.tip4: Alcohol and salt can make your fingers swell so refrain from measuring your ring size after cocktails and appetizers.

helpLinks.quality.message: We stand behind our products, materials and processes. This means we work with top jewelers, who commit to exceptional craftsmanship and ethical practices to produce quality essentials made to last.
helpLinks.returns.message: We offer free returns for a full refund within 60 days and store credit within 60 days. Engraved pieces are not eligible for return.

product.pickup.popup.text.1: 1. To qualify for in-store pickup all items in your bag must be available in-store, otherwise, your order will be shipped to you.
product.pickup.popup.text.2: 2. There is no service or shipping fee. It can take up to 24 hours before your order is ready for in-store pickup. Please wait for your 'Your Order is Ready for Pick-Up' email before coming in-store. All orders are securely stored for seven days
product.pickup.popup.text.3: 3. You will need the order number located on your confirmation email and ID to pick up your order.

faqmodal.returns.description.1: We offer free 30-day returns for all customers in the US, Canada, UK, Australia, and Germany. Shipping fees are non-refundable. Please note that a return shipping fee of $20 is charged for returns shipped from the EU and $30 for all other countries. These return shipping fees are deducted from the refund amount. The return window starts from the day the shipment is delivered/picked up.
faqmodal.returns.description.2: Items must be in their original condition without signs of wear or damage
faqmodal.returns.description.3: Items returned by mail must be in all original packaging (tags, box, and pouch included)
faqmodal.returns.description.5: Earrings used to pierce during a piercing appointment
helpLinks.returns.message.free: We offer free returns for a full refund within {days} days and store credit within {days} days. Engraved pieces are not eligible for return.

checkout.salesAgentBanner.title: Sales agent:
faqmodal.shipping.description.1: The shipping fee is charged based on the subtotal before taxes, discounts and non-refundable.
faqmodal.warranty.description.1: Under our warranty, we’ve got your back. This means that for 2 years from the date of purchase, we’ll take care of your product if any damage to the material or the workmanship of the jewelry occurs. Just contact us and we’ll work together to find a resolution.
faqmodal.warranty.description.2: We work with top manufacturers to create handcrafted, responsibly sourced pieces that are made to last. We’re confident in the quality of our product hence the 2-year coverage. This also means that the warranty does not cover lost items, scratches that come with normal wear and tear (like a bent ring or broken chain), improper use or storage of your product, and any modification to your product done by a third party outside of Mejuri.
faqmodal.warranty.description.3: Note: Items purchased through a third-party vendor (outside of Mejuri.com and/or Mejuri stores) will not be covered under Mejuri’s warranty. Please reach out to the company the items were purchased from.

product.fair.pricing.popup.description: Major brands in our industry markup their products 8-10x the actual cost. We do things differently.To make luxury accessible, we've built relationships with the best manufacturers and sell directly to you.Basically, our jewelry is handcrafted with the same top materials and quality craftsmanship as other luxury jewelry brands but without the traditional markups.
product.modal.finger.measurement.step1: Wrap a strip of paper around your finger where you'd like your ring to be.
product.modal.finger.measurement.step2: Make sure that the paper is pulled snug to your finger, the tighter the better, to find your best fit.
product.modal.finger.measurement.step3: Mark the spot where the paper meets and measure the distance with a ruler (mm).
product.modal.finger.measurement.step4: Use the below chart to determine your ring size.
